Name: Peter Pan Cocktail
Ingredients: 25 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Smoother, lighter and easier than most classic cocktails - perhaps a little too much so.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . The original recipe called for equal parts, including the bitters - surely a mistake.
Nutrition: One serving of Peter Pan Cocktail contains 161 calories
